author: prickett
msg: Changed the organization url to point to commons instead of
the top level Jakarta Apache site
Split junit properties file and integrated it into a first cut of a new maven
plugin for unit testing of Periodicity

author: prickett
msg: Added code to pull the jakarta-avalon-testlet java source out of cvs
Added a build.junit.properties file
Overode the maven test:test goal to define our own tests
Added a dependency to avalon-framework version 4.0
Added a dependency to xalan version 2.3.1

author: prickett
msg: This time I added a GetDbConnectionTest

author: prickett
msg: Fixed axion get task to ignore errors and use the timestamp
Added a java compile postGoal to delete the om directory
Added a dependency on village version 1.5.3
Added a dependency on commons-lang 1.0-b1
Added a dependency on log4j 1.2.6
Added a dependency on commons-collections 2.0
Added a Unit Test Source Directory to the project
Added a Get Database Connection Test
Changed the value for torque.java.dir to src/java
Changed the torque.targetPackage to org.apache.commons.periodicity.om

author: prickett
msg: Split the build.db.properties file into two different files
